Title: Requires certain businesses in which alcohol or cannabis is consumed have opioid antagonists
Summary: Requires retail licensees for on-premises consumption of alcohol and adult-use on-site consumption of cannabis licensees have opioid antagonists to be administered to patrons, staff or individuals on premises of such establishment.
LawCode: Amd ยง106, ABC L; amd ยง77, Cannabis L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law and the cannabis law, in relation to requiring certain businesses in which alcohol or cannabis is consumed to have opioid antagonists
